Description: Dark-red pottery ostracon, from the body of a vessel, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip (?) and with two parallel lines of cord-marked decoration, with remains of fourteen lines of thick black-painted demotic text on the exterior, now much faded, and an uncertain number of lines in black on interior.
Bibliographic references: Kaplony-Heckel 1963a / Die demotischen Tempeleide I: Text (p.53-5)
Kaplony-Heckel 1963b / Die demotischen Tempeleide II: Abbildungen (p.14)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (50429) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/50429)
Acquisition name: Purchased through: R J Moss & Co
